programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world’s only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollinators - The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - This island of the coast of Honduras stands out as a vacation resort hot spot. But it’s not just the sun and sand that brings the tourists in droves. It’s actually a diver’s paradise with shipwrecks scattered from all corners of the the island.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Chobe National Park: Land of Learning - In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africa’s most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Bald is Beautiful - After a terrible accident at the nursery forest school, life changes drastically for nine-month-old Alejandra. And at forest school, the students enjoy a poolside classroom where Valentino proves he’s much more than just a class clown.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Alaskan Summer - Nearly 20 hours of sunlight a day feed the season of abundance. Warmth unlocks water from the glaciers, ice caves and waterfalls. The water crashes into countless streams of the Inside Passage, feeding forest and wildlife alike. From June to August, Alaska becomes a paradise for it’s wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure - Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Elephant Rescue - When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Extreme Escapes - In Cambodia we venture to the banks of the Timor Rung River to the Shinta Mani Wild Hotel. A series of 15 tents deep in the wilderness and accessible only after a 3 hour drive from Phnom Penh, access is via a 400 metre zip wire.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep4
programme.desc: Zimbabwean-born Davi and Matt from Australia set out to build a house in the Chess Valley with a radical multicultural design. They decide to manage the venture themselves, and it's not long before the build veers off course.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA (S10) Ep5
programme.desc: TGI Fridays - Along with a lot of its competitors in the casual dining industry, TGI Fridays has fallen on hard times. The CEO tasked with turning things around is Ray Blanchette.

programme.title: Donal's Family Kitchen (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: These sloppy joes are slightly alternative but they are ridiculously addictive served up with an Asian inspired slaw and crispy onions. You can make your own crispy onions - or buy them ready made!

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Jamie gets festive with a whole range of delicious no-fuss recipes to help make your Christmas dinner extra-special. From a salmon gravadlax starter to brand new ways to do the turkey, roasties and Brussels & a bonkers new take on the Yorkshire pud.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Yorkshire - Nadiya returns to Yorkshire, where she lived for ten years, to discover the people preserving old, local traditions and others creating new ones.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Rick Stein arrives in the region of Perigord, famous for black truffles, walnuts and decadent dishes cooked with duck.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Thompson Family - Vikkie and Wayne have a habit of cooking a nightly backup meal for their fussy kids, which has made their shopping bills and food waste skyrocket. Will their kids like what Prue and Rupy have planned?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S12) Ep10
programme.desc: The Final - The three remaining bakers need to produce a carrot cake worthy of winning, come out tops in a technical based on a Belgian recipe and rustle up a showstopping banquet fit for the Mad Hatter's Tea Party.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The only way is up in this episode as Donal and his trusty sheepdog Max head northbound to county Antrim.

programme.desc: Jacqueline and Jamie - Architects Lizzie Fraher and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a London home. Will the finished build fulfil the dreams of the mother and son who share it?

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show (S30) Ep2
programme.desc: Graham Norton presents a lively chat show featuring Lesley Manville, Hugh Bonneville, Lashana Lynch, Big Zuu and Sam Ryder.

programme.desc: Brazilian And Bondi Beauties - On Bondi Beach, Australia, bikini beauties and adrenaline junkies find their paradise. In Florianopolis, Brazil, there’s sand boarding down the dunes.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S19 Ep3
programme.desc: Our Happy Place In North Myrtle Beach - A family buys a waterfront vacation home in North Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt S19 Ep4
programme.desc: A Hilton Head Hideaway - An engaged couple buys a beachfront vacation home on Hilton Head Island, South Carolina.

programme.title: Deadly Secrets S1 Ep6
programme.desc: A Killer Hand - Steven Willis’ life is turned upside down when a family member is murdered. He embarks on a search for the killer and three more people die before he learns the truth.

programme.title: Hometown Horror S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Threering Terror - A dark energy overshadows Baraboo, Wisconsin, home to the Ringling Bros. circus dynasty.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleo’s over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep12
programme.desc: A Stinky Situation /Fire-Fly - When Twig gets sprayed by a skunk trying to save his friends, the Mighty Ones agree not to ruin his hero moment by telling him that the stinks. Instead, they try to wash the smell off of him without him knowing. / The Mighty Ones are cold so when they hear about a wonderful creature known as a "fire-fly," they decide it will be the answer to their problems.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep13

programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can't Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa's New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky's Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Hatch Is - Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep26
programme.desc: Putting On A Show - The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep27
programme.desc: Motor Mouth - The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep28
programme.desc: Dancing Queen - Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal / Back To Ghoul - Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep58
programme.desc: Before They Hatch - A gargoyle with ties to San Lorenzo emerges from the portal and Puss must help find her hidden eggs before they hatch and feed on whatever or whoever is around!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep6
programme.desc: The Giver / Bellow Bug Day - Poppy attempts to discover which troll has been giving out yearly gifts at the Harvest MoonWhen Poppy accidentally ruins a Troll holiday her attempt to fix things keeps leading to more disasters.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep32
programme.desc: The Jungle Games - After making a bet against Uncle King Julien, King Julien must win the "Jungle Games" in order to maintain control of the royal crown.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria Falls & Winters - When the watering hole at a Zimbabwean animal park dries up, Whitebeard sends the Wanderers to the scene with a rain-producing Weather Key; but when Odlulu gets a hold of the key, the Wanderers must pursue her through rain, fog, and snow to save those animals.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Olivia Ep11
programme.desc: Olivia And The Crystal Ball - While Olivia and her brothers play fortune teller, baby William accidentally breaks Dad's new bowling trophy, When a friendly police officer shows up at the door selling raffle tickets, Olivia is convinced that he's come for William, and she devises a scheme to keep William safe from the “arms of the law”.

programme.title: Olivia Ep12
programme.desc: Olivia Packs Up - Tired of having to share with her brother Ian, Olivia sets out on a trip around theblock in search of a place free from little brothers. She imagines herself crossing a vast desert by camel – which isn't all it's cracked up to be – and eventually decides that having a little brother might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep11
programme.desc: Cici Spectacular - Mr Carburettor has asked CiCi to perform one of her stunts in front of a big crowd. CiCi is very nervous and Roary does his best to help his friend prepare for the event.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep12
programme.desc: Cry Cold - Big Chris is feeling ill so Marsha sends him to bed until he is better. Big Chris enjoys the attention rather too much and fails to let everyone know when he is on the mend.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep32
programme.desc: Castles and Caves - Archibald and his siblings embark on a quest in a Castles and Caves adventure game. As the Strutters delve into the fantasy realm, they realize that Archibald’s unusual choices will make the quest even more challenging. / Archibald and his siblings continue on their Castles and Caves adventure game. When they face off against the witch, they have to trust Archibald’s unique approach to hopefully win the game.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep6
programme.desc: Cereal / Tiny Danger - The Harvey street kids set out to solve the mystery of who stole their one of a kind cereal! Lotta fights back when Tiny is told that he’s too small to race in a bike race.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure… he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Gecko Has Amazing Friends Ep14
programme.desc: Laugh and learn with Gecko and the mechanicals at Gecko's Garage.

programme.title: Go Buster - Nursery Rhymes Ep16
programme.desc: The curious six-year-old Buster is a friendly and eager-to-learn yellow bus who takes on new adventures.

programme.title: Wheels on the Bus with the Sharksons by Little Baby Bum Ep12
programme.desc: Meet the Sharksons - an adorable family of sharks who love to sing, explore, dance and play.

programme.title: Bedtime with Little Baby Bum Ep68
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is a fun and educational show for kids featuring classic and new nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Digley and Dazey Save The Day Ep3
programme.desc: Best friends Digley and Dazey are part of a crack construction team, who go around building and fixing things in need of repair. Working hard as a team and using their creativity, they always save the day and learn new things along the way.

programme.title: Insectibles - End Game Ep4
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of a young boy - Zak, his grandfather, Gramps, and three bio-mechanically enhanced insects as they search to find pieces of the ‘Shrinkinator’ - the crazy invention that shrunk Zak & Gramps before it exploded.

programme.title: Insectibles - Size Matters Ep1
programme.desc: The series follows the adventures of a young boy - Zak, his grandfather, Gramps, and three bio-mechanically enhanced insects as they search to find pieces of the ‘Shrinkinator’ - the crazy invention that shrunk Zak & Gramps before it exploded.

programme.title: Oddbods Adventures Ep7
programme.desc: The sketch-based short-form comedy following the adventures of seven unique and adorable Oddbods characters.

programme.title: Fire and Monster Truck Madness at Gecko's Garage Ep15
programme.desc: Laugh and learn with Gecko and the mechanicals at Gecko's Garage.

programme.title: Morphle Fun and Madness Ep8

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: Dora the Explorer S03 Ep327
programme.desc: Dora's Pirate Adventure - Dora and friends are about to put on a pirate play when the Pirate Piggies steal their treasure chest and costumes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Yup Day - Baby convinces Daddy to say 'yup' to everything for a day. What's the worst that could happen?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep919
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle - When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep918
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race - The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Paddington and the Egg Hunt - Can Sofia make Windsor Gardens' biggest ever omelette? Only if Paddington can replace some cracked eggs in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep419
programme.desc: The 100 Egg Challenge - The Great Egg Hunt has just begun, and Blaze and Crusher are racing all over town to see who can find the most eggs. Only the first truck to collect 100 eggs will win the egg-ceptionally tasty chocolate trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots - Farmer Yumi’s carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pups Save the Easter Egg Hunt - It’s Adventure Bay’s annual Easter Egg hunt and the pups are helping Mayor Goodway with the egg decorating. The hunt for a very special egg leads Ryder and the Paw Patrol on an exciting adventure!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep311
programme.desc: The Oyster Bunny! - It's time for baby animals! Goby dreams up the Oyster Bunny, a mysterious character who loves baby animals. Can the Guppies follow an egg trail to find the elusive Oyster Bunny? A tasty treat awaits them!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep616
programme.desc: The Big Rig Bandit! - When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! But when the big rig chase lands Spotty and Eli in danger, it's up to the Guppies to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep919
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger / Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patrolle - When Humdinger disguises himself as a "Merdinger" to steal the purple pearl, the PAW Patrol must return it to Puplantis. // After Moby swipes the Whale Patroller and all the Pups' vehicles, the pups climb aboard sea creatures to chase it down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep918
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race - The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Floor is Lava - The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is George’s birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep106
programme.desc: We Love Nature - Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! A thunder makes things worse. Luckily, Anna's living room makes a great camp site!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Blue's Big Beat Band - Josh and Blue are starting a band! As we play Blue's Clues to find out what instrument Blue will play, we form our very own house band, learn rhythms, identify tempos, and sing, tap, and clap all day long.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus / Pup a Doodle Do - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster – Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train! // Mayor Goodway’s purse chicken “Chickaletta” has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele - Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Photo - Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep227
programme.desc: The Long Grass - The grass has grown so long that Peppa and George's ball gets lost. Grandpa arrives with his fantastic lawnmower and gets the grass cut in no time. Peppa and George find their plastic ball again and it bounces brilliantly on the short grass!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Paddington and the Egg Hunt - Can Sofia make Windsor Gardens' biggest ever omelette? Only if Paddington can replace some cracked eggs in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Pups Bark with Dinosaurs - The Paw Patrol is on an excavation dig when they unearth three fossilized eggs. Suddenly the eggs start to hatch, and there are three baby pterodactyls running around Adventure Bay! It's up to the PAW Patrol to catch the dinos!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots - Farmer Yumi’s carrots are disappearing and she calls Ryder and the Paw Patrol for help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Pups Save the Easter Egg Hunt - It’s Adventure Bay’s annual Easter Egg hunt and the pups are helping Mayor Goodway with the egg decorating. The hunt for a very special egg leads Ryder and the Paw Patrol on an exciting adventure!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep311
programme.desc: The Oyster Bunny! - It's time for baby animals! Goby dreams up the Oyster Bunny, a mysterious character who loves baby animals. Can the Guppies follow an egg trail to find the elusive Oyster Bunny? A tasty treat awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep419
programme.desc: The 100 Egg Challenge - The Great Egg Hunt has just begun, and Blaze and Crusher are racing all over town to see who can find the most eggs. Only the first truck to collect 100 eggs will win the egg-ceptionally tasty chocolate trophy!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Paddington and the Painting - Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Don't Yuck My Yum! - In the Gourmet Galaxy, everyone loves yummy food! But when General Yuck turns everything icky, only a recipe for delicious Moon Muffins can stop her. Master Chef Goby and his apprentice Deema must bake those muffins and save the galaxy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Blue's Rainy Day Rainbow - We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Blue's Anywhere Box Surprise - Hop in for a ride in Josh and Blue's Anywhere Box, where we can pretend to go... ANYWHERE! We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go, and visit the ocean, savanna and even our friend Polka Dots!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Pirate Painter - When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names “Fuzzy” takes a liking to him. // When Mayor Goodway accidentally takes off in a hot air balloon, Ryder and the Paw Patrol must make a dramatic rescue to save her and win the race!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223
programme.desc: GrandDad Dog's Garage - Peppa’s car runs out of petrol but thankfully Granddad Dog’s garage isn’t far away. With one phone call, Granddad Dog is on his way. He tows Peppa’s car back to his garage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Kite - While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap - Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Library Badge - When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Great Barrier Reef, Australia - The team dives into action as Glitch's treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: Straight and Wavy - Kit and Pup are skiing. Can you see who is making straight lines in the snow and who is making wavy lines? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators discover how wavy lines of rope are the same and how they are different.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Teddy - Dee encourages a friend to say 'teddy' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a rainbow teddy, a flying teddy, a fluffy teddy and even a flower teddy!

programme.desc: Stuck - All of the Teletubbies are stuck. Tinky Winky's hand is stuck in the bag, Dipsy's hat is stuck, Laa-Laa's ball is stuck and Po is stuck on the Tubby Slidey!

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Medal - Major gives three froglets medals for helping him, but the other froglets are jealous.

programme.desc: Kick Around - Team Tinpo are playing a game in their back yard when Doug-Po kicks the ball over a fence. How can they get their ball back?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep8

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep6

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep3

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep8

programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep10
programme.desc: Tonnes of illegal plant and meat products seized in one of Australia's biggest biosecurity breaches, the RFDS sees an influx of patients after record flooding in the country's north, plus the pandemic changed how we travel.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep23
programme.desc: Essendon won their first two games under new coach Brad Scott but lost the Saints last week. The Bombers host GWS after the Giants lost to Carlton by 10 points.

programme.title: Easter In Australia Ep
programme.desc: Jeremy Fernandez explores the most significant event on the Christian calendar. Investigating the mystery of transformation and renewal at the heart of the Easter story.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Sophapone Heuanglith is the face of sign language in Laos, shooting to fame when she hit back at criticism about her signing during COVID updates. Her stand is changing perceptions of people with hearing impairment.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep29
programme.desc: For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Round the clock coverage of the news that matters to you from the team you can trust.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep8
programme.desc: Guest reporter Craig Reucassel goes off the tourist track in Fiji to see how communities are dealing with the reality of climate change. Rising sea levels and cyclones are forcing Fijians to change their lives to survive.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep29
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso kick starts this season by visiting the Kulkalgal region, travelling to the Island of Warraberto find out more about their signature dishes, weaving and their climate change battle.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the end of this world first experiment where we bring two lonely groups together - teenagers and older adults. After six weeks, we'll see if they have reduced their sense of loneliness and isolation. (Final)

programme.title: Restoration Australia Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Host Stuart Harrison meets a Perth couple who want to resurrect their adored family home that was lost to fire in 2015. But will they be able to rebuild the 1960s iconic modernist house as its original architect envisioned?

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep4

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050
programme.desc: Hydrogen is a clean energy with a proven track record. But it's woefully underused. Together with a US public broadcaster, we look at how this element is being brought back in from the cold.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Main Event - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - In 1989, through the joint collaboration of the Catalan Autonomous Government, the Montmeló Town Council and the Royal Automobile Club of Catalunya (RACC), work began on giving one of Europe’s most beautiful cities a state of the art race track to match. The Circuit de Catalunya opened on the doorstep of Barcelona in September 1991 and welcomed its first international event that same month, hosting the Spanish F1 Grand Prix. It went on to host the European Motorcycle Grand Prix and in 1995 became home to the Gran Premio de Catalunya. Considered to be one of the best designed circuits of the recent era, the Circuito de Catalunya won the much coveted IRTA ‘Best Grand Prix’ trophy for 2001 and has a general admission capacity of 104,000 spectators.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2304
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022

In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.
